content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • The scope of the contract includes the demolition of the existing main block and its reconstruction for use as a mixed development with a retail podium and serviced residence.
  • The adjoining annex block will undergo major refurbishment to include retail and parking facilities and also a rooftop commercial-cum-culture space.
CLIENT

Corwin Holding Pte Ltd

LOCATION

2 Serangoon Road

COMPLETION YEAR

2019

AWARDS
  • BCA Construction Excellence Award, Commercial/Mixed Development Buildings Category – Merit 2021
  • BCA Design & Engineering Safety Awards, Project Category, 2021
  • WSH Performance (SHARP) Award 2020
  • BCA Green Mark Award 2020 – Goldplus
  • WSH Performance (SHARP) Award 2019
